channel.title: List Comprehension auf Nicky Reinert
channel.description: Blog & projects by Nicky Reinert (Institute for Digital Challenges): web development & software development, SEO & analytics, hosting & DevOps, WordPress & Hugo, tools & projects, data protection & digital culture — plus content on AI and autism & society.

item.title: Advent of Code - Day 3 - Multiplications (Python)
item.description: (task | solution) As I reached the third day of my adventure, I had already learned something new that significantly improves the process: the devcontainer.json file can handle creating and running the Docker container for me. This saves the trouble of manually building and running it—essentially …
item.dc:subject: Lesezeit: 5 Minuten
